member.summary: Gets / sets the maximum zoom factor value.

member.summary: Converts a point from client view coordinates to window coordinates

member.name: M:Nevron.Diagram.ThinWeb.NThinDiagramControl.HitTest(Nevron.GraphicsCore.NPointF)
member.summary: Returns a NNodeList collection containing all visual objects at the given window coordinates.
member.param: A point containing the hit-test coordinates.
member.returns: A object containing all visual objects at the given window coordinates.
member.remarks: Objects with highter z-order have greater index in the collection.

member.summary: Zooms to the specified rectangle in view coordinates

member.summary: Provides a valid hit test context, which can be used for document hit tests

member.name: M:Nevron.Diagram.ThinWeb.NThinDiagramControl.Zoom(System.Single)
member.summary: Applies equal X and Y scales of the view and preserves the current viewport center
member.retruns: true if zoomed successfully, otherwise false

member.name: M:Nevron.Diagram.ThinWeb.NThinDiagramControl.Zoom(System.Single,Nevron.GraphicsCore.NPointF)
member.summary: Applies equal X and Y scales of the view and makes the specified point the new viewport center.
member.returns: true if zoomed successfully, otherwise false

member.name: M:Nevron.Diagram.ThinWeb.NThinDiagramControl.IsValidScaleFactor(System.Single)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified scale factor is valid
member.remarks: This method takes into account the document settings MinZoomFactor and MaxZoomFactor properties.
member.returns: true if the scale factor is valid, otherwise false
